backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining restaurant data types (Mode, Category, Neighborhood, Restaurant) and a hardcoded array of 20+ Tokyo restaurants with filtering methods by mode, category, and neighborhood.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implementation of Unsplash carousel images in RestaurantCard and logo rendering in Header components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON summary of all frontend files describing their purpose, including App navigation, hooks for data fetching, UI components for header/footer/cards, and swipe/likes pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with OKLCH color system defining light/dark theme variables for black/white/gold color scheme.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with DishMatch title and root div mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing page state (swipe/likes) and mode state (Date/Business), rendering Header, Footer, and conditional page content.
frontend/src/components/FilterSheet.tsx: Bottom sheet component with filter controls for category, neighborhood, party size, and budget range using shadcn UI components.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright, Caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM parameters, and heart icon in gold accent color.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with DishMatch logo, mode toggle, and likes navigation button with gold accent styling.
frontend/src/components/ModeToggle.tsx: Toggle button group switching between Date and Business modes with gold active state styling.
frontend/src/components/RestaurantCard.t: Large card component displaying restaurant with 5-photo Unsplash carousel, navigation arrows, photo indicators, and overlay showing name, rating, location, price, and details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for ICP, managing login/logout state, identity persistence via AuthClient, and delegation validation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching restaurants by mode, category, and neighborhood from the backend actor, plus a localStorage-based likes system with add/remove mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for theming (dark mode support), using Poppins font and OKLCH color space for design tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component into the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/LikesGallery.tsx: Displays a grid gallery of liked restaurants with remove functionality, showing an empty state with navigation to swipe screen when no likes exist.
frontend/src/pages/SwipeScreen.tsx: Implements Tinder-style swipe interface for restaurants with filtering by category, neighborhood, and budget, featuring like/reject buttons and card navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the default theme with custom colors (gold, tinder-red/green), OKLCH color system, Poppins font, and animation utilities for accordions.
project_state.json: Project state file defining DishMatch, a Tinder-style restaurant discovery app for Tokyo with Date/Business mode toggle, swipeable cards, likes gallery, and black/white/gold design. Tracks existing features, requirements, and architectural notes including target audience (20-30s), design specs (Poppins font, specific color codes), and filtering logic for Date vs Business modes.
